extendedInfo.description: SlideIT keyboard is an excellent tool for entering text, replacing your touchscreen keyboard. SlideIT keyboard enables users to dramatically improve writing speed with practically no learning curve.Instead of entering text by tapping on the keyboard letters, SlideIT keyboard eases texting by sliding a finger along the keyboard letters, while the words âmagicallyâ appear on the screen.Love SlideIT? Please give us a 5-star Google Play rating and review. Weâre always trying to make SlideIT better. If you have questions or suggestions, please share them with us! support@mobiletextinput.comSlideIT keyboard version 7 includes many new features and fixes.â NEW!! SlideIT 7 now supports A.I.Type next-word prediction in many languagesMany keyboard skins for SlideIT are available for free download from the Android Market.SlideIT keyboard fully supports all Android versions from 2.2  and up, including tablets and Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean).With over 7,000,000 downloads, SlideIT keyboard has been an Android bestseller and selected as an editor's choice by Google.Among SlideIT's great features:â Smart predictions and disambiguationâ Over 70 language packs and layoutsâ More than 60 skinsâ Speech-to-textâ Keyboard customizationâ Import contacts from your phoneSlideIT's many great features make it the ultimate time-saving keyboard for Android devices. Writing e-mail, SMS messaging or just chating with your friends on a small touchscreen is now easy and fun!The best keyboard on the Android Market!~~~Reviews:âªâªâªâªâª ââ¦for one-handed text entry, SlideIT Keyboard is the current king of the hill.â - PCWorld, August 2010âªâªâªâªâª ââ¦Best keyboard around. A must have for the Android. It is the best app that I've boughtâ - SlideIT user reviewâCan I just say THANK YOU, a million times, I love this app and you saved me big time. I just switched from droid2 to droidx2 after 1 day, swype malfunctioned, and vz wireless tech support led me to you. He said it was way better anyhow, and he was right, customizable and all! Omg, I'm in heaven O:-)â - Customer feedbackLANGUAGE SUPPORT:SlideIT keyboard can load many languages, and you can switch between them with the press of a button!Afrikaans â Afrikaanse sleutelbord,Albanian â TastierÃ«s shqipe,Azerbaijani - AzÉrbaycan klaviaturaArabic â ÙÙØ­Ø© Ø§ÙÙÙØ§ØªÙØ­ Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ©,Belorussian â ÐÐµÐ»Ð°ÑÑÑÐºÑÑ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²ÑÑÑÑÑÑ,Brazilian â Teclado brasileiro,Bulgarian â ÐÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ° ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ð°ÑÑÑÐ°,Catalan â CatalÃ  teclat,Czech -ÄeskÃ¡ klÃ¡vesnice,Croatian â Hrvatske tipkovnice,Danish â Danske tastatur,Dutch -Nederlands toetsenbord,Estonian â Eesti klaviatuur,Finnish â Suomen nÃ¤ppÃ¤imistÃ¶,French â Clavier franÃ§ais,German â Deutsch Tastatur,Greek â ÎÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÏ ÏÎ»Î·ÎºÏÏÎ¿Î»ÏÎ³Î¹Î¿,Hebrew â ××§×××ª ×¢××¨××ª,Hungarian â Magyar billentyÅ±zet,Icelandic â Ãslenska lyklaborÃ°iÃ°,Indonesian â Bahasa Indonesia keyboard,Italian â Tastiera italiana,Korean - íêµ­ì´ í¤ë³´ë,Latvian â Latvijas klaviatÅ«ras,Lithuanian â Lietuvos klaviatÅ«ros,Norwegian â Norsk tastatur,Persian â ØµÙØ­Ù Ú©ÙÛØ¯ ÙØ§Ø±Ø³Û,Polish â Polska klawiatura,Portuguese â Teclado PortuguÃªs,Romanian â RomÃ¢n tastaturÄ,Russian â Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ°Ñ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ð°ÑÑÑÐ°,Serbian â cyrillic â ÐÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸ÑÐ° ÑÑÐ¿ÑÐºÐ° ÑÐ°ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÐ°,Serbian â latin â Latin srpskoj tastaturi,Slovak â SlovenskÃ¡ klÃ¡vesnica,Slovenian â Slovensko tipkovnico,Spanish â Teclado en espaÃ±ol,Swahili â Swahili keyboard,Swedish â Svenskt tangentbord,Turkish â TÃ¼rkÃ§e klavye,Ukrainian -Ð£ÐºÑÐ°ÑÐ½ÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²ÑÐ°ÑÑÑÐ¸.These packs include a variety of keyboard layouts: QWERTY, QWERTZ, AZERTY, COLEMAK, DVORAK, BÃPO, NEO and SVORAK.

reviews.title: Still not polished
reviews.comment: I use this keyboard SOLELY for the slide on buttons for symbols. The prediction is still way off, it randomly breaks up words, and the deal breakers? Doesn\'t use the latest Google Voice, so it rarely understands anything; plus the secondary symbols page is atrocious- have to go through a maze to get to the underscore!
reviews.author: Gina Schade

reviews.title: The Best!
reviews.comment: This is the best keyboard to use with AIDE. Also great with everything else! I love the little cursor keys which are enabled by holding down the \',\' key. Brilliant!
reviews.author: Chris Nash

reviews.title: Keeps getting worse
reviews.comment: Very slow to use, and worse with each new version. Takes too long to process each swipe. Accuracy hasn\'t gotten any better since version 1.
reviews.author: Joshua A

reviews.title: Keyboard not optimized for HTC One X
reviews.comment: Purchased this keyboard over a month ago, it lacks consistency. Requiring it to be unistalled \"too many times\" then installed again to use.
reviews.author: Lennix Compton

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Not the greatest keyboard. I hate the fact that I can\'t type in 2 languages without pressing a button. SwiftKey Let\'s me type in 2 different languages without having to press a button to change current language. If you implement this to your keyboard, I will switch back to it. Otherwise, not going to happen.
reviews.author: Alberto S.

reviews.title: I think DASUR TEAM is run by a bunch of infants.
reviews.comment: I never thought an app could suck and blow simultaneously. But this one does. Edit, please DASUR download Swype or SwiftKey Flow to properly get a handle on how a keyboard should be made! FYI, this keyboard sucks! Google won\'t allow a zero star rating. So imagine me giving you a no star rating.....................   Update, Fleksy is out. Need I say more????!!!!!! Enough said!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! update; Minuum will be arriving soon. And they have the keyboard down! Why can\'t you\302\277
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: Great keyboard!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Carrots
reviews.comment: Feature filled yet terrible keyboard for swipe typing. I misspell word most often with this keyboard. To the point where I wanna through my phone against a wall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting worse
reviews.comment: Still no facility to save to SD card and takes up a lot of phone memory. After the last update, the pound sign has disappeared. Where is it?
reviews.author: Ada Young

reviews.title: Excellent swipe but poor tap keyboard
reviews.comment: For whatever reason, I can\'t seem top get the tap keyboard top work properly...
reviews.author: Kitty Nouveau

reviews.title: Line breaks sometimes
reviews.comment: This app has served me well for a long time but the recent update is buggy on xperia T. The line breaks when I\'m typing and doesn\'t register the words
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5-star-apps
reviews.comment: Super nice. Been loving it for a year now.
reviews.author: Adrian Kailola

reviews.title: Will get 5 stars if they add a numeral line
reviews.comment: The stock standard keyboard on my Galaxy S4 has a 4th line at the top for numerals. So much easier than press and hold. SlideIt needs to add this as well.
reviews.author: Mac Harris

reviews.title: Simply the best.
reviews.comment: Love the update. Love the popup letters. Just awesome. Keep it up. The absolute best hands down. I\'m surprised it\'s not ranked higher. I\'ve all of them. Smdh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I would give it 5 stars if I didn\'t have to uninstall and reinstall the app everytime I turn off my phone.
reviews.author: melissa manuel

reviews.title: Sgs3
reviews.comment: Wondering why my phone keeps freezing, just caught on that it only happens when keyboard is present. Only been happening since last update. You\'re getting replaced by Swype.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs lock feature
reviews.comment: every time i type on my tablet the keyboard drifts sideways, annoying! please add a lock keyboard feature!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best keyboard
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app. One idea I would like to see incorporated is instead of arrows to move cursor around in text, open up a slid pad, or better still an activate button which makes the keyboard a slide pad, activating the cursor and allows you to slide the cursor to the correct position. Good job guys, keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wth happen?
reviews.comment: Why do I have to keep setting it to slide it keyboard everytime I reboot my phone its never done that before plz fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: Since new update I\'m lucky if every tenth word is right while using the swipe
reviews.author: Stephen York
